overview: There is an old chant from old times between Azerbaijani tribes that tells the story of a girl named Saray. Saray was a beautiful girl from Moghan and was in love with the head of the shepherds of the tribe, Aydin. Just a few days after the engagement of Saray and Aydin, Soltan Beig (leader of tribe) took advantage of Aydin's absence to seize and force Saray to marry him.
title: Saray
